Text: Yes, PLEASE MORE Hawaiian Eye!  - THANKS!!!
Great show, great memories, thank you very much for posting it.
Hello & thanx for the Hawaiian eyes!  I would love to see more episodes, especially the  shows which feature Greg MacKenzie aka Grant Williams.

Thanks so much for all the wonderful TV programs you have shared! Do you have any earlier Hawaiian Eyes? I understand that Don Sullivan (Giant Gila Monster) played Cricket's boyfriend in some of these.
